effect.diamond_pearl: Permanently replaces itself with the target’s last used move. If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
effect.platinum: Permanently replaces itself with the target’s last used move. If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Permanently replaces itself with the target’s last used move. If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Permanently becomes the target’s last used move.
short_effect.platinum: Permanently becomes the target’s last used move.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Permanently becomes the target’s last used move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It enables the user to learn a move used by the foe. Once used, the move Sketch disappears.
flavor_text.platinum: It enables the user to learn a move used by the foe. Once used, the move Sketch disappears.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the foe. Once used, Sketch disappears.
